analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/22/0xc061737518855ef5f2a853499c49baa08c2c914e.sol:
	Contract EOSPlusToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/22/0xc061737518855ef5f2a853499c49baa08c2c914e.sol#223)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/22/0xc061737518855ef5f2a853499c49baa08c2c914e.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/22/0xc061737518855ef5f2a853499c49baa08c2c914e.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/22/0xc061737518855ef5f2a853499c49baa08c2c914e.sol#74-75) is not in mixedCase
